ygData.subject: Re: Must read!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Wah, have I just joined the secret society? ;-? Let me see, 2 sp for a bread and a milk at most.  7 food + 7 drink shld be able to last for one EQ week.  Say
ygData.messageBody:
Wah, have I just joined the secret society? ;-?

Let me see, 2 sp for a bread and a milk at most. 7 food + 7 drink shld be
able to last for one EQ week. Say we got max 20 of us...so one week treat
is 2x7x20=280sp=28gp=2.8pp

Cost less than a shock of lighting scroll, heh.

Ziltus.

On Wednesday, June 16, 1999 2:23 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...]
wrote:
> This is an atempt to make us a tad more organise
>
> We will from now onwards, be 100% base on Innoruuk. Anyone who disagree,
give me
> your address and I'll force you to agree with a parang.
>
> This is the short list of characters we have, please fill it up.
>
> > Name Character Class Race Level Location
> > -----------------------------------------------------------------------
> > Sereph Sereph Bard Half Elf 3 Greater Faydark
> >
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > LKW Ziltus Wizard High Elf 12 Freeport
> > -----------------------------------------------------------------------
> > Alex Yiyang Monk Human 17 Freeport
> >
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > Entreri Radeon Monk Human 4 Freeport
>
> Groups will be form base on levels. Each member in the group should not
have a
> level difference of more than 3/4 from each other. This is to make
grouping
> worth doing for the high level guys, and the lower level ones.
>
> If possible, please summit a character report every friday night
indicating your
> current level/where you are/what items you've found etc.........
>
> So far, here are the groups:
>
> Group 1, Level 15-19 -> Alex(Tank)
> Group 2, Level 10-14 -> LKW(Magic support)
> Group 3, Level 5-9 -> ???
> The rest who are still very low level-> Enteri(Tank), Sereph(Secondary
Support)
>
> Anyone who change server, or propose a change of server without a valid
reason
> will be forced to treat everyone on the list to lunch, for a week, so,
don't
> anyhow change servers.
